text.text_translated: Feedback is information about a person's work. Many managers say something good. Then, they say something bad. After that, they say something good again. Workers start to think the good words are not real. They think the good words are only there for the bad information. So the good words become less important. Managers should use good words differently. They should use them to support good work. This helps workers do more good work.
